thread.title: mtv love school season: Russian girl, Delhi boy win 'MTV Love School Season 2'
thread.title_full: mtv love school season: Russian girl, Delhi boy win 'MTV Love School Season 2' - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: mtv love school season: Russian girl, Delhi boy win 'MTV Love School Season 2'
text:
Delhi-based couple Pasha Doll and Khemraj Bhardwaj on Saturday were announced as the winners of TV show " MTV Love School Season 2".
The show featured actors Karan Kundra and Anusha Dandekar helping 10 couples to resolve their issues and rekindle their relationship.
Khemraj and Pasha , who had multiple problems when they began their journey in the show, went on to progress in their relationship and came out as winner.
While Pasha hails from Russia and is a DJ in Delhi, Khemraj works as a website designer.
"It feels great to win ‘MTV Love School Season 2'. Khemraj and I started off with so many issues and now that all of them are resolved, I feel at peace," Pasha said in a statement.
"The time we spent at ‘Love School' made me realise that Khemraj is the one for me," she added.
Commenting on his victory, Khemraj said: "All I can say is that I am at a happy place right now. Pasha is the calm at the centre of my storm. When we set out to be a part of ‘MTV Love School Season 2', all we had in our mind was to work on our relationship. Coming from a different nationality, nobody had ever imagined that Pasha and I will win the show, but we did."
